document.heading: JUDICIAL DECLARATION OF PARENTAGE AMENDMENT OF 2011

history.narrative: Law 19-233, the “Judicial Declaration of Parentage Amendment Act of 2011,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 19-615. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on Oct. 16, 2012, and Nov. 2, 2012, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on Nov. 20, 2012, it was assigned Act No. 19-550 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 19-233 became effective on Mar. 19, 2013.
